nodes.text: The Wayward Comet was a refueling station. During the war against the First Order, the Resistance members Finn and Poe Dameron visited the station, along with Norik and Oron, so that Dameron could meet with a contact. While on the station, Finn got into a fight with a Dashade, and was noticed by the Clawdite Remex Io, a member of the notorious Kendoh Gang.
